title: Workshop on VR-Based Learning Environment Design and Facilitation Strategies for Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of VR technology and intermediate-level expertise in the sciences
context.additional_context: Enhanced competency in creating and applying science education content using VR devices.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance knowledge acquisition effectiveness by over 20% by optimally sequencing VR animations and auditory texts.

Learners can write practical application plans for three real-world case studies using five advanced questioning strategies (e.g., "5 Why Analysis," "Scenario Expansion") in VR learning simulations and achieve an "excellent" rating in at least two out of three rubric criteria (clarity, creativity, feasibility).
Learners can propose three or more VR-text integration strategies following sequence design principles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
